title: Matrix Watch Face
summary: Watch face for smart watches using Android Wear
description: This watch face replicates the "code rain" found in the movie The Matrix. Download and install this APK onto your phone, and see your wrist become something out of Hollywood. Hope you enjoy it!
descriptionHTML: This watch face replicates the "code rain" found in the movie The Matrix. Download and install this APK onto your phone, and see your wrist become something out of Hollywood. Hope you enjoy it!
comments: HATE IT This is so lame it doesn't work
Works great.. Makes my watch look futuristic.
recentChanges: Memory consumption significantly reduced, which allows for faster performance and the creation of more rain droplets.
